verses.text: \w Come|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, ye \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* hearken, ye \w people|strong="H1471"\w*: let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* therein, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* cometh \w forth|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H4393"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H1878"\w* thick \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* buck \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*, \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w marrow|strong="H2459"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* victim \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Bosra \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* recompenses \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* judgment \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sion.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w streams|strong="H5158"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w pitch|strong="H2203"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* thereof \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w brimstone|strong="H1614"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w burning|strong="H1197"\w* \w pitch|strong="H2203"\w*.

\w Night|strong="H3915"\w* \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* \w it|strong="H3915"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w quenched|strong="H3518"\w*, \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w it|strong="H3915"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w lie|strong="H5927"\w* waste, \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w it|strong="H3915"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* bittern \w and|strong="H0068"\w* ericius \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ibis \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w raven|strong="H6158"\w* \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w line|strong="H0068"\w* \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* be \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* bring \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w nothing|strong="H8414"\w*, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* plummet, unto \w desolation|strong="H8414"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*: \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* rather \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4410"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w nothing|strong="H0369"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1323"\w* \w thorns|strong="H2336"\w* \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w nettles|strong="H7057"\w* shall \w grow|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w its|strong="H5927"\w* houses, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* thistle \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w fortresses|strong="H0759"\w* thereof: \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* habitation \w of|strong="H1323"\w* dragons, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* pasture \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w ostriches|strong="H3284"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8033"\w* demons \w and|strong="H8033"\w* monsters shall \w meet|strong="H6298"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hairy ones shall \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H7453"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* hath \w the|strong="H5921"\w* lamia lain \w down|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w rest|strong="H4494"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w herself|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* hath \w the|strong="H8033"\w* ericius \w had|strong="H0802"\w* \w its|strong="H7077"\w* hole, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w brought|strong="H6908"\w* \w up|strong="H1234"\w* \w its|strong="H7077"\w* young ones, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* hath dug round \w about|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* cherished \w them|strong="H6908"\w* \w in|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* thereof: thither \w are|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* kites \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w one|strong="H0802"\w* \w to|strong="H8033"\w* \w another|strong="H0802"\w*.

\w Search|strong="H1875"\w* ye diligently \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w*: \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* wanting, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* proceedeth \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* hath \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* line: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* therein.
